projects: [{"title":"DevCamper API","start_date":"Dec 2020","end_date":"Jan 2021","description":"Created an extensive backend using Express for a Bootcamp directory websiteUsed mongoose and MongoDB to create Bootcamp, Course, Review, and User Model Created middlewares for error handling, password encryption, etcDeveloped app integration with REST and other APIs for getting exact coordinates of a location, security, authorization"},{"title":"ProShop","start_date":"Oct 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020","description":"Created an e-commerce web application by using Express.js for backend API, JWT, and OAuth for authentication and Redux for State management and Integrated React with Express using Hooks and Async/Await practicesCreated the Interactive Web pages using React.js framework for a product, checkout process, user profile, and admin managementAdded features such as PayPal/credit card integration, database seeder, product search, and pagination feature, etcTo view the web application -> https://proshopapp1610.herokuapp.com"},{"title":"DevConnecter","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Oct 2020","description":"• DevConnector is a social network platform for developers, which includes authentication, profiles and forum posts• Created an extensive backend API with Express and testing with postman, integrated React with Expressusing React Hooks and Async/Await practices and used JWT and OAuth for authentication• Created the Interactive Web pages using React.js framework for the register, login, profile, and dashboard pages• To view the web application -> https://secret-ravine-40910.herokuapp.com/"}]

honors_and_awards.title: Intelligent Banking Case Challenge by HDFC Bank
honors_and_awards.description: Participated and secured third position among 62 teams in a case study competition about leveraging artificial intelligence on HDFC bank.
